column2: ENGLISH
Cosmic Oracle
The Precursors
Xenu
Ashtar
The Hungering Star
Outer Invasion
The Classified Documents
Celebrate UFO Day
Alien worshipers gather every year to stargaze and celebrate in the name of their extraterrestrial gods, perhaps hoping to see one of their flying ships.
A new Cosmic Oracle has been crowned.
Declare Yourself the Cosmic Oracle
I can now unify the faith behind me by declaring myself Cosmic Oracle.
The Cosmic Oracle

Although it had unified the pre-Event alien cults, the Falling Star faith had often debated how they should be led as a collective community, believing that only a prophet anointed by the Precursors could lead them. These alien worshipers have now found their leader, who reportedly walked into the ancient fortress at Groom Lake and stayed there for three days, emerging afterwards and claiming that they were anointed the new Cosmic Oracle. Whether or not these claims are true, many Falling Star adherents are rallying around them, and a new age of grand-scale holy wars in the name of their extraterrestrial gods has been declared - the Outer Invasions.
I am the voice of the Precursors.
In the name of our alien overlords!
They must be stopped.

[Root.GetTitledName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the adherents of '[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]' in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nWe must save the people from [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] and enlighten them to the will of the universe!

[Root.GetTitledName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of [New.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the barbaric heathens!\n\nThese uneducated followers of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] must find extraterrestrial enlightenment!

[Root.GetTitledName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the [New.Religion.GetName] infidels in [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the deniers of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe profaners of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will pay for their lies!
If only I could experience his glory for myself...
You will switch over to playing as the Renovator.
You head out to celebrate UFO Day.
UFO Day

You join the rest of the camp early in the morning, tents set up in the wilderness where aliens were most known to frequent. Celebrations have already begun, with vendors selling alien merchandise and practitioners chanting in Precursor tongue.
Let's have some fun!

You all spend the day drawing a great 'crop circle' in the desert, partaking in a feast afterwards. Performers re-enact the creation story of humanity at the hands of extraterrestrials, depicting events throughout pre-Event history as actually being the work of the Precursors.
Nonbelievers are blind to the truth.

Night falls and the sky is lit up with stars, allowing the faithful to bring out their telescopes and stargaze upon the cosmic heavens above. Such stargazing is meant to be a symbolic show of vigilance in the hope that the Precursors will eventually return to bring salvation, and the night ends with a reminder of hope.
May we walk among the stars next year!
UFO Day comes to an end.
Celebrated UFO Day
Recently Astral Projected
Go On A Precursor Pilgrimage
I will go on pilgrimage to visit where humankind most directly interacted with the Precursors.
The pilgrimage is one of the greatest honors that worshipers of the Precursors can receive, allowing them to embark on a grand journey to learn about their faith and their history.
And now it is my turn.
There are many sites where humans and extraterrestrials made history together, though I must decide which of the most prominent sites shall be my pilgrimage destination.
You prepare for your journey to Roswell, saddling up on supplies before heading on your way.
Off to Roswell!
You prepare for your journey to the Eastern Ranges, saddling up on supplies before heading on your way.
Off to Eastern Ranges!
You prepare for your journey to Rainier, saddling up on supplies before heading on your way.
Off to Rainier!
